This time allows you the opportunity to gain additional skills and contribute to EPAM by supporting internal projects, mentoring, conducting candidate technical interviews (see EPAM Technical Training course), host a Lunch & Learn and completing learning and development activities, all while actively searching for your next billable project. As finding that next project is your top priority, please review these video modules to learn how to search for a role within Opportunities and How to Prepare for a Customer Interview.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[200]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your Title and Location is up to date.
